              of
               
              thick-ribbèd
               
              ice
              ,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text:
To
               
              be
               
              imprisoned
               
              in
               
              the
               
              viewless
               
              winds

speaker: CLAUDIO
text:
And
               
              blown
               
              with
               
              restless
               
              violence
               
              round
               
              about

speaker: CLAUDIO
text:
The
               
              pendent
               
              world
              ;
               
              or
               
              to
               
              be
               
              worse
               
              than
               
              worst

speaker: CLAUDIO
text:
Of
               
              those
               
              that
               
              lawless
               
              and
               
              incertain
               
              thought

speaker: CLAUDIO
text:
Imagine
               
              howling
              —
              ’tis
               
              too
               
              horrible
              .

speaker: CLAUDIO
text:
The
               
              weariest
               
              and
               
              most
               
              loathèd
               
              worldly
               
              life

speaker: CLAUDIO
text:
That
               
              age
              ,
               
              ache
              ,
               
              penury
              ,
               
              and
               
              imprisonment

speaker: CLAUDIO
text:
Can
               
              lay
               
              on
               
              nature
               
              is
               
              a
               
              paradise

speaker: CLAUDIO
text:
To
               
              what
               
              we
               
              fear
               
              of
               
              death
              .

speaker: ISABELLA
text:
Alas
              ,
               
              alas
              !

speaker: CLAUDIO
text:
Sweet
               
              sister
              ,
               
              let
               
              me
               
              live
              .

speaker: CLAUDIO
text:
What
               
              sin
               
              you
               
              do
               
              to
               
              save
               
              a
               
              brother’s
               
              life
              ,

speaker: CLAUDIO
text:
Nature
               
              dispenses
               
              with
               
              the
               
              deed
               
              so
               
              far

speaker: CLAUDIO
text:
That
               
              it
               
              becomes
               
              a
               
              virtue
              .

speaker: ISABELLA
text:
O
              ,
               
              you
               
              beast
              !

speaker: ISABELLA
text:
O
               
              faithless
               
              coward
              ,
               
              O
               
              dishonest
               
              wretch
              ,

speaker: ISABELLA
text:
Wilt
               
              thou
               
              be
               
              made
               
              a
               
              man
               
              out
               
              of
               
              my
               
              vice
              ?

speaker: ISABELLA
text:
Is
               
              ’t
               
              not
               
              a
               
              kind
               
              of
               
              incest
               
              to
               
              take
               
              life

speaker: ISABELLA
text:
From
               
              thine
               
              own
               
              sister’s
               
              shame
              ?
               
              What
               
              should
               
              I
               
              think
              ?

speaker: ISABELLA
text:
Heaven
               
              shield
               
              my
               
              mother
               
              played
               
              my
               
              father
               
              fair
              ,

speaker: ISABELLA
text:
For
               
              such
               
              a
               
              warpèd
               
              slip
               
              of
               
              wilderness

speaker: ISABELLA
text:
Ne’er
               
              issued
               
              from
               
              his
               
              blood
              .
               
              Take
               
              my
               
              defiance
              ;

speaker: ISABELLA
text:
Die
              ,
               
              perish
              .
               
              Might
               
              but
               
              my
               
              bending
               
              down

speaker: ISABELLA
text:
Reprieve
               
              thee
               
              from
               
              thy
               
              fate
              ,
               
              it
               
              should
               
              proceed
              .

speaker: ISABELLA
text:
I’ll
               
              pray
               
              a
               
              thousand
               
              prayers
               
              for
               
              thy
               
              death
              ,

speaker: ISABELLA
text:
No
               
              word
               
              to
               
              save
               
              thee
              .

speaker: CLAUDIO
text:
Nay
              ,
               
              hear
               
              me
              ,
               
              Isabel
              —

speaker: ISABELLA
text:
O
              ,
               
              fie
              ,
               
              fie
              ,
               
              fie
              !

speaker: ISABELLA
text:
Thy
               
              sin’s
               
              not
               
              accidental
              ,
               
              but
               
              a
               
              trade
              .

speaker: ISABELLA
text:
Mercy
               
              to
               
              thee
               
              would
               
              prove
               
              itself
               
              a
               
              bawd
              .

speaker: ISABELLA
text:
’Tis
               
              best
               
              that
               
              thou
               
              diest
               
              quickly
              .

speaker: CLAUDIO
text:
O
              ,
               
              hear
               
              me
              ,
               
              Isabella
              —

speaker: DUKE
text:
Vouchsafe
               
              a
               
              word
              ,
               
              young
               
              sister
              ,
               
              but
               
              one
               
              word
              .

speaker: ISABELLA
text:
What
               
              is
               
              your
               
              will
              ?

speaker: DUKE
text: Might you dispense with your leisure, I

speaker: DUKE
text: would by and by have some speech with you. The

speaker: DUKE
text: satisfaction I would require is likewise your own

speaker: DUKE
text: benefit.

speaker: ISABELLA
text: I have no superfluous leisure. My stay must

speaker: ISABELLA
text: be stolen out of other affairs, but I will attend you

speaker: ISABELLA
text: awhile.

speaker: DUKE
text: Son, I have overheard

speaker: DUKE
text: what hath passed between you and your

speaker: DUKE
text: sister. Angelo had never the purpose to corrupt her;

speaker: DUKE
text: only he hath made an assay of her virtue, to practice

speaker: DUKE
text: his judgment with the disposition of natures. She,

speaker: DUKE
text: having the truth of honor in her, hath made him

speaker: DUKE
text: that gracious denial which he is most glad to

speaker: DUKE
text: receive. I am confessor to Angelo, and I know this

speaker: DUKE
text: to be true. Therefore prepare yourself to death. Do

speaker: DUKE
text: not satisfy your resolution with hopes that are

speaker: DUKE
text: fallible. Tomorrow you must die. Go to your knees

speaker: DUKE
text: and make ready.

speaker: CLAUDIO
text: Let me ask my sister pardon. I am so out of

speaker: CLAUDIO
text: love with life that I will sue to be rid of it.

speaker: DUKE
text: Hold you there. Farewell.—Provost, a

speaker: DUKE
text: word with you.

speaker: PROVOST
text: What’s your will, father?

speaker: DUKE
text: That now you are come, you will be

speaker: DUKE
text: gone. Leave me awhile with the maid. My mind

speaker: DUKE
text: promises with my habit no loss shall touch her by

speaker: DUKE
text: my company.

speaker: PROVOST
text: In good time.

speaker: DUKE
text: The hand that hath made

speaker: DUKE
text: you fair hath made you good. The goodness that is

speaker: DUKE
text: cheap in beauty makes beauty brief in goodness,

speaker: DUKE
text: but grace, being the soul of your complexion, shall

speaker: DUKE
text: keep the body of it ever fair. The assault that Angelo

speaker: DUKE
text: hath made to you, fortune hath conveyed to my

speaker: DUKE
text: understanding; and but that frailty hath examples

speaker: DUKE
text: for his falling, I should wonder at Angelo. How will

speaker: DUKE
text: you do to content this substitute and to save your

speaker: DUKE
text: brother?

speaker: ISABELLA
text: I am now going to resolve him. I had rather

speaker: ISABELLA
text: my brother die by the law than my son should be

speaker: ISABELLA
text: unlawfully born. But, O, how much is the good

speaker: ISABELLA
text: duke deceived in Angelo! If ever he return, and I

speaker: ISABELLA
text: can speak to him, I will open my lips in vain, or

speaker: ISABELLA
text: discover his government.

speaker: DUKE
text: That shall not be much amiss. Yet, as

speaker: DUKE
text: the matter now stands, he will avoid your accusation:

speaker: DUKE
text: he made trial of you only. Therefore, fasten

speaker: DUKE
text: your ear on my advisings. To the love I have in doing

speaker: DUKE
text: good, a remedy presents itself. I do make myself

speaker: DUKE
text: believe that you may most uprighteously do a poor

speaker: DUKE
text: wronged lady a merited benefit, redeem your brother

speaker: DUKE
text: from the angry law, do no stain to your own

speaker: DUKE
text: gracious person, and much please the absent duke,

speaker: DUKE
text: if peradventure he shall ever return to have hearing

speaker: DUKE
text: of this business.

speaker: ISABELLA
text: Let me hear you speak farther. I have spirit to

speaker: ISABELLA
text: do anything that appears not foul in the truth of my

speaker: ISABELLA
text: spirit.

speaker: DUKE
text: Virtue is bold, and goodness never

speaker: DUKE
text: fearful. Have you not heard speak of Mariana, the

speaker: DUKE
text: sister of Frederick, the great soldier who miscarried

speaker: DUKE
text: at sea?

speaker: ISABELLA
text: I have heard of the lady, and good words

speaker: ISABELLA
text: went with her name.

speaker: DUKE
text: She should this Angelo have married,

speaker: DUKE
text: was affianced to her oath, and the nuptial appointed.

speaker: DUKE
text: Between which time of the contract and

speaker: DUKE
text: limit of the solemnity, her brother Frederick was

speaker: DUKE
text: wracked at sea, having in that perished vessel the

speaker: DUKE
text: dowry of his sister. But mark how heavily this befell

speaker: DUKE
text: to the poor gentlewoman. There she lost a noble

speaker: DUKE
text: and renowned brother, in his love toward her ever

speaker: DUKE
text: most kind and natural; with him, the portion and

speaker: DUKE
text: sinew of her fortune, her marriage dowry; with

speaker: DUKE
text: both, her combinate husband, this well-seeming

speaker: DUKE
text: Angelo.

speaker: ISABELLA
text: Can this be so? Did Angelo so leave her?

speaker: DUKE
text: Left her in her tears and dried not one

speaker: DUKE
text: of them with his comfort, swallowed his vows

speaker: DUKE
text: whole, pretending in her discoveries of dishonor; in

speaker: DUKE
text: few, bestowed her on her own lamentation, which

speaker: DUKE
text: she yet wears for his sake; and he, a marble to her

speaker: DUKE
text: tears, is washed with them but relents not.

speaker: ISABELLA
text: What a merit were it in death to take this

speaker: ISABELLA
text: poor maid from the world! What corruption in this

speaker: ISABELLA
text: life, that it will let this man live! But how out of this

speaker: ISABELLA
text: can she avail?

speaker: DUKE
text: It is a rupture that you may easily heal,

speaker: DUKE
text: and the cure of it not only saves your brother, but

speaker: DUKE
text: keeps you from dishonor in doing it.

speaker: ISABELLA
text: Show me how, good father.

speaker: DUKE
text: This forenamed maid hath yet in her

speaker: DUKE
text: the continuance of her first affection. His unjust

speaker: DUKE
text: unkindness, that in all reason should have

speaker: DUKE
text: quenched her love, hath, like an impediment in the

speaker: DUKE
text: current, made it more violent and unruly. Go you to

speaker: DUKE
text: Angelo, answer his requiring with a plausible obedience,

speaker: DUKE
text: agree with his demands to the point. Only

speaker: DUKE
text: refer yourself to this advantage: first, that your stay

speaker: DUKE
text: with him may not be long, that the time may have all

speaker: DUKE
text: shadow and silence in it, and the place answer to

speaker: DUKE
text: convenience. This being granted in course, and

speaker: DUKE
text: now follows all: we shall advise this wronged maid

speaker: DUKE
text: to stead up your appointment, go in your place. If

speaker: DUKE
text: the encounter acknowledge itself hereafter, it may

speaker: DUKE
text: compel him to her recompense; and here, by this, is

speaker: DUKE
text: your brother saved, your honor untainted, the poor

speaker: DUKE
text: Mariana advantaged, and the corrupt deputy

speaker: DUKE
text: scaled. The maid will I frame and make fit for his

speaker: DUKE
text: attempt. If you think well to carry this as you may,

speaker: DUKE
text: the doubleness of the benefit defends the deceit

speaker: DUKE
text: from reproof. What think you of it?

speaker: ISABELLA
text: The image of it gives me content already, and

speaker: ISABELLA
text: I trust it will grow to a most prosperous perfection.

speaker: DUKE
text: It lies much in your holding up. Haste

speaker: DUKE
text: you speedily to Angelo. If for this night he entreat

speaker: DUKE
text: you to his bed, give him promise of satisfaction. I

speaker: DUKE
text: will presently to Saint Luke’s. There at the moated

speaker: DUKE
text: grange resides this dejected Mariana. At that place

speaker: DUKE
text: call upon me, and dispatch with Angelo that it may

speaker: DUKE
text: be quickly.

speaker: ISABELLA
text: I thank you for this comfort. Fare you well,

speaker: ISABELLA
text: good father.
